part 1: Dearest Linda, please forgive this transgression.
part 2: Please forgive my absent mind on account of my dog's needing surgery.

part 1: Hello Linda, Of course I'll do my part.
part 2: Of course I also need to know next weeks schedule because of my dogs surgery.
part 3: Of course my mistake will be fixed.

part 1: Linda, as you may remember, you are not my boss.
part 2: As you may remember, my dog is in great need of surgery.
part 3: As you may remember, I still have time to submit.

part 1: Linda, I've been quite busy with important stuff.
part 2: I've been busy with both work and my surgery-needing dog.
part 3: Lets get back to being busy, shall we?

phrase: If you would be so kind
part 1: Dear Linda, would you kindly forgive this error on my part?
part 2: If you would be so kind, have mercy on this poor surgery-needing dog owner.
part 3: Let me hastily fix this mistake, if you would be so kind.
